overview.mainHeadingText: In this application you can generate content for your social media or your website
overview.mainDescriptionText: If you have trouble coming up with text for your website, about your product, or social media post, use our artificial intelligence that will be happy to help you!
overview.remainingAnswersDescription: Number of answers you can still generate
overview.subscriptionNotPaid: Your subscription is depleted, upgrade your plan!

barChart.title: Answers overview
barChart.description: Your answers in the selected period

generateSocialPostContentPromptTitle: Create content for your social media
generateSocialPostImageContentPromptTitl: Use images to create content for your social media
generateSocialPostContentPromptDescripti: Write an idea for your social media content and our system will help you generate it. We have prepared a sample message in the message field so you can see how the system works.
generateSocialPostImageContentPromptDesc: Upload an image to generate text for it. You can also let AI edit the image or generate an image completely from text. We have prepared a sample message in the message field so you can see how the system works.

prompt.title: Generate content
prompt.postGenerationResultsEmptyStateText: The results of the previous generation will be displayed here so you can choose the post that works best for you.
prompt.result: Click Generate to see the result
